Sentencas: Understanding the kinetics of oxygen exchange between the gas phase and a ceramic electrode is key to optimising the performance of electrochemical energy conversion devices such as Solid Oxide Fuel Cells.
Titulo: Imaging LEIS of micro-patterned solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Clearly the surface chemistry of these materials is important, and surface sensitive techniques such as Low Energy Ion Scattering (LEIS) can provide important compositional information key to unravelling electrode kinetics.
Titulo: Imaging LEIS of micro-patterned solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: In this work, we use high lateral resolution LEIS to perform local analyses of a micropatterned electrode structure, of the type often used for studies of the geometrical dependences of electrode performance.
Titulo: Imaging LEIS of micro-patterned solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: We find that the results are comparable to those for bulk materials, but detect evidence of cation interdiffusion from the electrode to the electrolyte.
Titulo: Imaging LEIS of micro-patterned solid oxide fuel cell electrodes

Sentencas: Finally, we note that this preliminary study could open the prospect of in situ measurements of cells near operating conditions.
Titulo: Imaging LEIS of micro-patterned solid oxide fuel cell electrodes
